details:
To start using PROS 3 on Windows, simply download the latest version of the installer (.exe file) from [here](https://github.com/purduesigbots/pros-cli3/releases/latest/).

Make sure that you download the correct version of the installer for your computer (32- or 64-bit). You will run into problems if you use the wrong one.
name: install-windows
title: Installing on Windows
